contents:
刚才论坛应该是在例行备份数据库，被我刷出来这个。

https://pincong.rocks/article/16468?notification_id=4764063&item_id=318263,318316,318326,318497,318515,318557,318680,318687,318697,318730
Database error

------



SQL: UPDATE `aws_notification` SET `read_flag` = '1' WHERE read_flag <> 1 AND id = 4764063 AND recipient_uid = 26126



Error Message: SQLSTATE[42S02]: Base table or view not found: 1146 Table 'panic.aws_notification' doesn't exist, query was: UPDATE `aws_notification` SET `read_flag` = ? WHERE (read_flag <> 1 AND id = 4764063 AND recipient_uid = 26126)
